verbs.description: [ARG0: small explosions] [V: draw] [ARG1: hazmat crews evacuation at nw portland garbage center update 2 p m] the transfer center has reopened but the household hazardous waste portion of the facility remains closed portland fire hazmat crews evacuated a northwest portland garbage and recycling transfer station operated by metro after a pressurized 55-gallon drum began leaking an unknown substance hazmat technicians suited up and entered the metro central transfer station at 6161 nw 61st avenue around midday wednesday to try to identify what was in the leaking drum they believe it is a benign material the department said on twitter 6161 nw 61st ave hm technicians believe the product is benign will be on scene for a bit longer initial concerns are calmed expect crews to be clearing soon more info when available alert metro central transfer station center metro twitter alert portland portland oregon
